title: CHANGE MY HEART, O GOD
bible_ref: Create in me a pure heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me. Psalm 51:10
verses: Change my heart, O God, Make it ever true.=Change my heart, O God, May I be like you.=You are the Potter, I am the clay;=Mould me and make me, This is what I pray=Change my heart, O God, Make it ever true.=Change my heart, O God, May I be like you.
